name: D3 Exercises
body: These are the working solutions for 3 simple exercises of varying degrees of difficulty done for an Information Visualization class in Spring 2013. Instructions of these exercises can be found here. I encourage attempting these exercises without looking at the source code, and instead, follow Scott Murray's book, “Interactive Data Visualization for the Web”, and his repo of examples as reference. Exercise 1: ============== Exercise 2: ============== Exercise 3: ============== For full solution of Exercise 3, download the repo and open 'Exercise_03.html'.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
